TopicTitle: Why orbit flags are so messed up?

Articles.Content:
With the last version dock to a space station is a nightmare,

The orange and purple flags blinks around , disappears, do not change when you change your orbit.

Why a basic function like this one it's so messed up?
Turns out calculating (all the) intercepts consistently is hard. The last couple of devnotes have had quite a bit of detail about this. It should be better in 1.2.

2 hours ago, KerbalXcer said:

Report that to the devs.

They are well aware, and as was mentioned have included information about fixing the situation in the last couple devnotes.
Yep. A good deal of effort has gone into making this more stable and give better intercepts for 1.2. Unfortunately there isn't a way to sort this out in 1.1.3.
